attributes.action: End Coronavirus Lockdowns for those who wish to resume normal life
attributes.additional_details: To help as many people and companies survive to promote a strong economy in the future. The impacts on the young, the least vulnerable, is disproportionately higher in an economic and social sense than on those who actually benefit from the restrictions, often the old and overweight. You cannot sacrifice the lives and futures of the younger generations on a virus with an ever decreasing rate of mortality and very very low risk to their lives. It should now be people’s choice
attributes.background: Stop generalised curfews and lockdowns as they are ineffective, breed social discontent and are economically crippling. Number of cases is a terrible metric for the impact of the virus. The short and long term effects of the restrictions are far more damaging than the actual virus.
